Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

Bread Flours
Water
Honeys
Olive Oils
Kosher Salt
Active Dry Yeasts

Recipe

Attach breadmaker arm hi
Put in 1 cup Water hi
Put in 4 tsps Olive Oils hi
Put in 2 cups Bread Flours hi
Put in Â½ tsp Kosher Salt hi
Put in 4 tsps Honeys hi
Put in center the 2 tsps Active Dry Yeasts hi
Put bread maker on bread setting (menu item 1) with medium crust and 2 lb loaf and hit start hi
Let bread cool for 20 minutes hi
Slice bread hi
